meanings.definition: Excessive sensitivity of the skin or sense organs.
meanings.sent1: Her hyperesthesia made it painful to even lightly touch her skin.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with hyperesthesia after she complained of extreme sensitivity to touch.
meanings.sent3: His hyperesthesia was so intense that he could feel a fly land on his skin from a mile away.
meanings.sent4: The hyperesthesia of her sense organs was like having superpowers, but without the fun.
meanings.sent5: The hyperesthesia of his skin was like living in a world where every sensation was turned up to the maximum volume.

meanings.definition: Abnormal acuteness of sensitivity to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The hyperesthesia caused him to jump at the slightest sound.
meanings.sent2: She experienced hyperesthesia, feeling every touch as if it were magnified.
meanings.sent3: His hyperesthesia was so extreme that he could hear a pin drop from miles away.
meanings.sent4: The hyperesthesia of his senses was like having a superpower that he couldn't control.
meanings.sent5: Living with hyperesthesia was like being in a world where every sensation was turned up to the highest level.
